tweets.text: Horrific figures. How are we ever going to be able to safely swim in our rivers if this continues? @lbbdcouncil @LondonPortAuth @EnvAgencySE @LDN_environment @Thames21 @BeFirstLondon https://t.co/tsRGiy3XMl

Good God Almighty, @WHO on earth @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids would sanction this ? What inhumane rush for money is this all about? Just a couple of years difference. @JuliaBradbury @DrMariaNeira @ShaunLintern @JournoJess_ @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe https://t.co/UBOWZ4zDek

@EnvAgencyMids Came out of the Royal Stoke Hospital at 9-45am and the odour was there, that is not acceptable at a medical facility under any circumstances, I'm afraid your organisation is not fit for purpose.

If lack of resources are stopping @EnvAgency sorting out Walleys Quarry, are the govt looking at providing a lump sum to get it sorted and avert a mass public health disaster? Remember, we elected you @RishiSunak @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock

tweets.text: Iv been so poorly. Antibiotics & steroids for me! GP says i have pleurisy & he suspects its the result of being gassed out by landfill gas H2S in my own home, especially last Thursday! @ClareDinnisEA where is the @EnvAgency urgency in resolving this #StopTheStink  @AaronBell4NUL

@EnvAgencyMids you currently assess H2S from against annoyance (30 min avg 7ug/m3) and health (24hr avg 150ug/m3), what are the effects of several hundred ug/m3 for 12 hours day after day? This is our nightly reality. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL

Never mind telling us contact our local authority for an evacuation plan regarding the Whalley‚Äôs landfill site @ClareDinnisEA @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @WHO @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @PHE_uk You have a duty of care. We still don‚Äôt know the plans??#humanrightsact @NewsNBC

tweets.text: On the @EnvAgency call on Wed a gentleman gave a heartbreaking account of how his elderly mother can‚Äôt breathe when the gas comes strongly into her house and has been to hospital ten times now due to gas exposure.This is far beyond not good enough @RedIndustries2 @BGFinvestments

@EnvAgencyMids How about stopping operations until they are compliant at the very least? Your allowing a company to accept further waste onto a site which has been found in breach of 10 regulations and all they‚Äôve been seen to of done is hire a Relations Manager... How can you justify this?
Comments please @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids #StopTheStink https://t.co/pWLZwZrCi4

@EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @pow_rebecca @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @AaronBell4NUL @ @scottdegg 
Maybe somebody can explain why those containers are only delivered on the days when the site manager is off? I also have video footage taken this morning. https://t.co/XbrrexLUfB

urls.title: | Environment Agency Board Member
urls.description: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs Environment, Food & Rural Affairs D irector of Floods and Water, Defra ‚Ä¢ Departmental Official Chair, Environment Agency ‚Ä¢ Representative of Organisation Chair, Highways England ‚Ä¢ Independent Member ‚Ä¢ sets the strategy, drives performance and holds the organisation to account; ‚Ä¢ provides stewardship for public funds and environmental outcomes. The Board is made up of a Chair, Chief Executive and up to 14 other members. The Board has a collegiate style. It

tweets.text: Update on the #Torksey #flood scheme in #Lincolnshire. Sheet pile work now complete, work on the bank will continue for the next few weeks. https://t.co/abux5u21TK
